title: MR.SIGA Toilet Brush and Holder Set, Wall Mounted Toilet Bowl Brush, Compact Toilet Scrub Brush with Holder for Bathroom, Black, 2 Pack
features: DURABLE CONSTRUCTION & WALL MOUNTED DESIGN : Durable and flexible TPR fibers create long lasting bristles for strong cleaning ability but the toilet brush won't scratch the toilet bowl. Wall mounted design without drilling for easy storage, effectively save storage space, The toilet brushes & holders also can be stored with floor standing

SANITARY & EFFICIENT CLEANING: Strong TPR bristles are not easy to get deformed which remove stains easily, the flat shaped black toilet brush head with dense TPR bristles offer thorough and deep cleaning for under-rim area and those hard-to-reach corners. leaves your toilet bowl spotless and sanitary. Water easily drips off bristles into bottom of holder, brings you a refreshing cleaning experience

ERGONOMIC HANDLE & EASY TO CLEAN: The toilet brushes features a thick and solid handle which fits comfortably in hand and ensures a firm grip, brings you more convenience. The one-piece toilet cleaner brush is very easy to clean, clean this toilet brush black effortlessly after use, giving you a pleasant experience

BLACK STYLISH FINISH: With a modern black finish, this toilet brush set adds a touch of elegance to any bathroom decor. The stylish design complements contemporary bathrooms while providing essential functionality

SATISFACTORY CUSTOMER SERVICE: Customer satisfaction is our primary purpose, if you have any dissatisfaction with our loo brush and holder set, please contact us at the first time, we will do our best to give you a satisfactory solution
description: Product Description Previous page Next page Flexible TPR Brush Head The flexible brush head is designed to reach into crevices and grooves, effectively removing stubborn stains, wider brush head for multifunctional cleaning Easy to Clean Rinse it under water after use, and it's ready for the next clean.
